tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have visited Dr. Manak for RCT and Iâ€™m really happy and satisfied with his treatment. He literally has magic in his hands and he is so kind and friendly.

I had RCT from 3 different doctors and I had very bad experience previously and I was very traumatized before and really didnâ€™t wanted to visit any dentist.

I read about Dr. Manak and after looking at his reviews I decided to visit his clinic. After my first siting I can say that I have made the best decision of my life, itâ€™s was completely painless. Even when he pricked me for local anesthesia, I didnâ€™t feel any pain.

I would definitely recommend him, you can visit him for any dental related problem ** ***** ** ** **** *** ****** *** **** ******* *** experienced in his field.

Thank You Dr. Manak. God Bless You. You are really a wonderful doctor.

I had booked an appointment and reached 10 minutes prior to the scheduled time. I could see another patient known to the doctor, who came after me being treated ahead of me. I had to wait for more than 1hr after which doctor checked me and explained me  that I will require 2-3 dental fillings and scaling. But I was really surprised to know that I will have to come back after 7 days. Doctor mentioned that he is completely occupied for the week and made me pay consultation charges to make sure I come back next week. But his practo schedule showed majority of the slots unbooked. **** ** ****** ************** *** **** * ******** ** **** **** ********* I would request practo to monitor this properly so that patients don't spend their precious time waiting. I booked an appointment with another doctor and got the procedure done next morning in a single seating ******* ** ******* *** * ******** **** * I am very satisfied with my decision.

Recommended for sure!!
